# NebRUG 2024

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Sign up for the Nebraska R User Group on [meetup](https://www.meetup.com/neb-rug/?eventOrigin=event_home_page).

## Our Events

```{r}
library(calendR)
library(lubridate)

meetups <- yday(mdy(c("10-29-2024")))
talks <- yday(mdy(c("12-04-2024")))

events <- c(meetups, talks)
color <- c(rep("goldenrod", length(meetups)), rep("salmon", length(talks)))


calendR(year = "2024",
        month = c(10:12),
        special.days = events,
        special.col = color,            # Color of the specified days
        low.col = "white") 

```
